    BFI in Python

BFI in Python

Hassan Pazira

September 25, 2023

Python.Rmd

Overview

The R package BFI (Bayesian Federated Inference)

Python Instalation

The steps to install the latest version of Python on ‘MacOS’ and ‘Ubuntu’:

For MacOS 

# install BFI from GitHub
devtools::install_github("hassanpazira/BFI")
# load BFI
library(BFI)

# load `trauma` data
data("trauma")
# attach the data
attach(trauma)

For Ubuntu 

?trauma

Installing PIP

PIP (a Python package manager) helps us to install and use various packages/modules in Python programming.

Install/Upgrade the latest version of PIP by running the following command:

On MacOS 

colnames(trauma)
## [1] "sex"       "age"       "hospital"  "ISS"       "GCS"       "mortality"

On Ubuntu 

colnames(trauma)
## [1] "sex"       "age"       "hospital"  "ISS"       "GCS"       "mortality"
